name: Music_4097.wav
keywords: ['hip-hop song', 'male voice', 'quirky sounds', 'hand claps', 'programmed percussion', 'synth sounds', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This hip-hop song features a male voice singing the main melody. There are other quirky voices singing in the background. This is accompanied by programmed percussion playing deep kick and snare hits. Hand claps are played on alternate counts of the bar. This song can be played in a club.
